tweet.text: President Reagan and the First Lady visited #Russia for Moscow Summit May 29 to June 1, 1988, culminating in an exchange of documents with Soviet General Secretary Gorbachev and ratifying the Intermediate-Range Nuclear Forces Treaty. https://t.co/rzFCaqYiaF #FRUS @Reagan_Library
tweet.html: President Reagan and the First Lady visited #Russia for Moscow Summit May 29 to June 1, 1988, culminating in an exchange of documents with Soviet General Secretary Gorbachev and ratifying the Intermediate-Range Nuclear Forces Treaty. buff.ly/2IY1Lcv #FRUS @Reagan_Library
